room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: This was just great. A lot of team chaos, and some finely crafted puzzles. Kudos to the creators!

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: Love this! Great game to play with friends, family or strangers!

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: This was so much fun !! One of the highlights of our trip ..great way to spend time with family or friends !! Can't wait to do the next one !! The hour flies by !! Well worth the money

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: Had a great time! Already spreading the word about how much fun i had.

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: Absolutely the most fun ever! Challenging, yet possible. We solved the room with only milliseconds to spare! Adrenaline rush all the way! Recommend it to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: Really fun and challenging! The staff did a great job and we had a blast! Made it out with a minute and a half to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Spark of Resistance" by 60 Minutes to Escape in Portland
review: The challenge level was just right. Tense without being TOO tense, and between the eight of us, somebody had the right perspective and skill set for each puzzle. Clever use of theme to tie it all together and a at hint system that didn't break the flow of give everything all away. Designed for fun and not frustration, without being easy. A great evening!!
